snippet: Mr. Tàpies grounded his work in the brute reality of the Spanish street and in the turbulent political dramas of his youth in Catalonia.
abstract: Antoni Tapies, Spanish abstract painter who used unconventional materials to create paintings with tactile surfaces, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Tàpies grounded his work in the brute reality of the Spanish street and in the turbulent political dramas of his youth in Catalonia.

headline.seo: Antoni Tàpies, Spanish Abstract Painter, Dies at 88
headline.main: Antoni Tàpies, Spanish Abstract Painter, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Antoni Tapies, a Painter With Textures, Dies at 88
